biotools.summary:
LipidCreator workbench to probe the lipidomic landscape.

LipidCreator is a plugin for Skyline supporting targeted workflow development in lipidomics. It can be used to create user-defined target lists and fragment libraries for PRM and MRM experiments in Skyline. It also supports standalone and command-line operation.

LipidCreator_HumanPlatelet_application.

bioschemas.name: LipidCreator_skyline
